sentences.en: ‘How's the job going?’ ‘So far so good.’.
sentences.cn: “工作进展怎么样？”“目前还不错。”。

sentences.en: "Does it sound like music?" — "I wouldn't go that far."
sentences.cn: “这听上去像音乐吗？”——“我可不那样认为。”

sentences.en: A conservative estimate of the bill, so far, is about £22,000.
sentences.cn: 到目前为止，这笔账单保守估计大约为2.2万英镑。

sentences.en: a few frames from the original film were too far gone to salvage.
sentences.cn: 母片中的几个画面太差了，根本无法补救。

sentences.en: As far as I'm concerned the officials incited the fight.
sentences.cn: 在我看来，是官员们煽动了这场争斗。

sentences.en: conditions were far from satisfactory.
sentences.cn: 条件简直难尽人意。

sentences.en: expanding industry sucked in labour from far and wide.
sentences.cn: 工业发展吸收了广大区域内的劳动力。

sentences.en: extension of this practice would &B{go far towards} resolving unnecessary antagonisms.
sentences.cn: 如果推广这种做法，就能大大有助于消除不必要的对抗。

sentences.en: far be it from me to speculate on his reasons.
sentences.cn: 我决不去揣测他的种种理由。

sentences.en: Far off to the west the sun was sinking.
sentences.cn: 远处夕阳西下。

sentences.en: Have you driven far?
sentences.cn: 你开了很远了吗？

sentences.en: He had wandered to the far end of the room.
sentences.cn: 他转到屋子的那一头。

sentences.en: He started to explain, but he didn’t get far (= he did not succeed in saying very much ) before Mary interrupted him.
sentences.cn: 他开始解释起来，但没说几句就被玛丽打断了。

sentences.en: he was the bright one and everyone was sure he would go far.
sentences.cn: 他是个聪明人，大家都确信他会取得很大的成就。

sentences.en: His style was far removed (= very different ) from that of Picasso.
sentences.cn: 他的风格与毕加索有天壤之别。

sentences.en: How far do those old, outdated laws affect today’s legislation?
sentences.cn: 那些陈旧过时的法律对今天的立法有多少影响？

sentences.en: I wasn't too happy with what I'd written so far.
sentences.cn: 我对于目前已写完的这些并不太满意。

sentences.en: If you remember these three golden rules you won't go far wrong.
sentences.cn: 记住这三条金律，就不会错到哪儿。

sentences.en: Many people felt that the new law did not go far enough (= did not have a big enough effect, so that more needed to be done ) .
sentences.cn: 许多人认为新的法律力度不够。

sentences.en: On the far side of the street, two boys were playing marbles.
sentences.cn: 在街道的那一边，两个男孩在玩弹子游戏。

sentences.en: Oxford's social circle was far too liberal for her taste.
sentences.cn: 牛津的社交圈过于开放,不合她的胃口.

sentences.en: Parallel lines will never meet no matter how far extended.
sentences.cn: 无论延伸多长，平行线永不相交。

sentences.en: people came from far and near to the party.
sentences.cn: 人们从各处来参加聚会。

sentences.en: Robinson didn't think the story was so far off the mark.
sentences.cn: 鲁宾逊认为这个报道根本算不上离谱。

sentences.en: She is by far the best executive in the company.
sentences.cn: 她目前是公司中最为优秀的决策人

sentences.en: Since I changed jobs, I have to travel further to get to work.
sentences.cn: 我换了工作，上班更远了。

sentences.en: So far 57 have taken the test and all have been negative.
sentences.cn: 到目前为止，参加测试的有57人，测试结果均呈阴性。

sentences.en: So far the films have grossed more than £590 million.
sentences.cn: 到目前为止，这些电影的总票房已超过5.9亿英镑。

sentences.en: surely they wouldn't go so far as to break in?.
sentences.cn: 他们不至于硬闯进来，对吧？。

sentences.en: The economy is the number one issue by far.
sentences.cn: 到目前为止，经济是头等大事。

sentences.en: the existing business had priority so far as further investment was concerned.
sentences.cn: 就进一步的投资而言，现有业务享有优先权。

sentences.en: the hotel's royal suite is a far cry from the poverty of his home country.
sentences.cn: 酒店的皇家套房与他祖国的贫穷反差太大了。

sentences.en: The impact of religion on voting has been analysed far too simplistically.
sentences.cn: 有关宗教对选举的影响的分析太过简单了。

sentences.en: the money would not go far at this year's prices.
sentences.cn: 以今年的价格，这些钱派不了多大用场。

sentences.en: the statement appears to be a claim too far.
sentences.cn: 这张单子看来是一份过分的索赔。

sentences.en: They will arrive at nine, as far as we know.
sentences.cn: 就目前所知，他们将在九点钟到

sentences.en: We can walk to my house from here. It isn’t far.
sentences.cn: 我们可以从这里步行去我家，不远。

sentences.en: We’ve kept the original features of the house as far as possible (= as much as possible ) .
sentences.cn: 我们尽量保留了房子的原貌。

sentences.en: You could see the mountains in the far distance.
sentences.cn: 你可以看到远处的群山。

phrases.tran_cn: 远到，一直到，至于：到达某一点、程度或范围
最，显然：到达极为明显的程度

phrases.phrase: far be it from (或 for) me to

phrases.tran_cn: 差的，劣质的；恶化的；无可救药的

phrases.phrase: go so far as to do something
phrases.tran_cn: 到做（过激之事）的地步；竟然做

trans.tran_en: used to talk about how much progress someone makes, or how much effect something has

trans.tran_cn: 遥远地，远至，久远，非常，进展程度
trans.tran_en: used to talk about how much progress someone makes, or how much effect something has
used to talk about how much progress someone makes, or how much effect something has
